org.openhab.binding.lcn

Class LCNBinding<P extends LCNBindingProvider>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.events.AbstractEventSubscriber
      • org.openhab.core.binding.AbstractBinding<P>
        • org.openhab.core.binding.AbstractActiveBinding<P>
          • org.openhab.binding.lcn.LCNBinding<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openhab.core.binding.BindingChangeListener, org.openhab.core.events.EventSubscriber, org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService, org.osgi.service.event.EventHandler

    public class LCNBinding<P extends LCNBindingProvider>
extends org.openhab.core.binding.AbstractActiveBinding<P>
implements org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService
    This class handles all necessary traffic from and to LCNModules. It implements the actual Binding which is later used via openHAB.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LCNBinding.Credentials
      Represents a single username-password combination.
      static class  LCNBinding.FirmwareJob
      Used to reliably gather firmware information.
      static class  LCNBinding.PingJob
      A simple Job that will Ping the PCK software every now and again, to make sure, that channels are not closed.
      static class  LCNBinding.ReconnectChannelJob
      A simple QuartzJob to reconnect channels.
      static class  LCNBinding.RequestJob
      A simple Job that will request data for modules, which do not support auto-updates.

      • parseLCNShort

        public static java.lang.String parseLCNShort(java.lang.String lcnShort,
                             java.lang.String openHABcmd)
        Parses:
        LCNShort(with variables) to LCNShort(without variables)
        or
        A mapping to LCNShort.
        Parameters:
        lcnShort - The lcnShort form OR a mapping.
        openHABcmd - The command send by openHAB.
        Returns:
        String with the result, can be NULL!
